data.price: (Musa) dedi: “Onlar haqqındakı bilgi Rəbbimin yanında olan bir Kitabdadır (lövhi-məhfuzdadır). Rəbbim nə xəta edir, nə də unudur!”
data.arabic: قَالَ عِلۡمُهَا عِندَ رَبِّي فِي كِتَٰبٖۖ لَّا يَضِلُّ رَبِّي وَلَا يَنسَى

meta.transliteration: qāla ʿil'muhā ʿinda rabbī fī kitābin lā yaḍillu rabbī walā yansā

dua.name: Dua for Inner Contentment
dua.significanceReason: Seeks understanding and acceptance of divine decree, promoting inner peace and contentment.

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
